name: Unicorn Dungeon Tutorial
description:
Play the full game here: https://stand-off-software.itch.io/unicorn-dungeon

This is the tutorial for Unicorn Dungeon and it's completely free!

It can currently be played in English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, or Russian.

Unicorn Dungeon is an absurdist comedy point & click adventure game set in the strange (and often silly) magical land of Artovya, but actually just in a dungeon.

Grab this demo/tutorial and give it a try for free.
